title: NoSleep Podcast S14E06
description:
It’s Episode 06 of Season 14. This week we conjure spells for you about the intoxicating allure of new experiences. “Forever, a Drug” written by Nick Moore (Story starts around 00:05:35) TRIGGER WARNING! Produced by: Phil Michalski Cast: Narrator – Graham Rowat, Scott – Peter Lewis, Jared – Jesse Cornett, Old Man – David Cummings, Him – Mick Wingert “Midnight at the Acid Light Dance” written by Marcus Damanda (Story starts around 00:23:00) TRIGGER WARNING! Produced by: Jess
